reviews.review_text: A great gym with good equipment and friendly staff. The main reason for the review is to flag how helpful Yash Modi was for myself and my partner. As a member of the gyms staff, he was incredibly friendly, informative and provided great advice around membership. Would recommend asking for him if youre looking for membership information.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Rupert. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! - Gold s Gym University Market Place Team.

reviews.review_text: Golds gym has an amazing environment for people anywhere along their gym journey. The staff are really friendly. The fitness consultant shaiyan has a lot of knowledge and gives great tips to plan my workout.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Advay. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your positive experience with us. Warmly, Gold s Gym University Market Place Team.

reviews.review_text: the customer service here was amazing: front desk was super receptive even though I was new to this gym! Will definitely be considering joining :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Nikita. Thanks for the review! We appreciate the kind words and are glad we could provide you with a positive fitness experience at Gold s Gym University Market Place. Kindly, Gold s Gym University Market Place Team.

reviews.review_text: Excellent customer service by Shaiyan!! He was extremely patient and understanding, and did his best to provide a personalized membership option best-suited for my needs. Much appreciated!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Jashelle. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! - Gold s Gym University Market Place Team.

reviews.review_text: I moved to Vancouver while the Covid-19 lockdown was ongoing from Ontario. I wanted to get back to the gym ASAP. Golds BC offered me a good deal in May for multi-access across all Golds Gyms in BC, which would activate once the gyms were allowed to reopen. I first used the West Broadway facility before the UBC location reopened. The UBC location is great. It has everything I need. The staff are friendly. Not hard to register a spot (right now you need to make a reservation to workout), since the location isnt crowded. I think the company is doing pretty good considering the circumstances.

I ve never felt so welcomed and comfortable at a gym before! Everyone there is so kind. I have to give a special shout-out to someone who has been exceptionally welcoming. Ariana is one of the personal trainers there and she has helped me tremendously with my fitness journey. She is very knowledgeable and easy to connect with. Highly recommend her to anyone who is looking to get into working out for the first time!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were happy you enjoy your gym membership at our UBC location Michelle, thank you!

reviews.review_text: The atmosphere of the gym is so good . But more importantly is the trainers . I have been trained with Ariana for more than 30 sessions . She is so professional , patient and friendly, just made each session so much fun ! Really enjoy my personal traning here with her !

Has been working out here for more than 5 years and the equipment is always clean. Mike Zhang helped me to get the best plan and has been giving me so many constructive advice for body building. Way better experience comparing to Bird Coop as there s little to no waiting time here. Really recommend it to bring friends

Bryan Wong coached me and guided me through my peak into a powerlifting meet. He was super nice, down to earth, helpful, and most of all, motivating. Bryan checked up on me regularly even on off-days.  He helped me become more efficient in my lifts and set me up for success. Bryan offered to handle my meet for free and guided me to a Bronze medal.

Best gym I have ever been to. Just got my membership a month ago, along with the most amazing personal trainer. I have never felt so at home at a gym before. With the help of Ariana s knowledge and welcoming attitude, it did not take me long to feel fully immersed in the golds community. Just over two weeks into my training with Ariana I was already seeing major improvement in my strength and overall fitness. If you want to really push your fitness to the next level I recommend you see Ariana at golds!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Makayla! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and community here. Well be sure to let Ariana know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Legitimately one of the best gym environments I ve been in, here s why: The front desk staff are extremely courteous and chirpy so they never fail to put you in a good mood before you step in the gym. The trainers are VERY knowledgeable and are happy to offer advice to anyone who is interested , just ask ! The management team is also proactive in making sure the members  needs are being met and take member feedback very seriously. Overall, a great environment with awesome people who GENUINELY care about you. I d recommend anyone reading to check it out when they can!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback and review, Aarya! We are happy to hear that you are enjoying your entire experience with us and will be sure to let the entire team know what you said. Glad to have you part of the community, happy lifting

reviews.review_text: I have been training with Bryan Wong for about 4 months and the experience has been amazing! Bryan has great communication skills and truly cares for his clients. He has a keen eye for assessing his clients fitness and effectively communicates long-term and short-term goals for his clients with realistic strategies to achieve them. He makes it easy to understand the reasons for each exercise and the metrics for keeping track of progress. He also has very clear explanations for correcting postures and avoiding injuries which are especially important for weight training. I am very happy with the quality of PT provided by Bryan and Golds Gym. As for the gym, it is very clean and offers a wide variety of equipment. The staff are very friendly and members are conscientious. I would highly recommend Golds Gym UMP for people interested in fitness and are either studying at UBC or living on campus.

Such a good gym, the staff and trainers are all so friendly and are willing to help when you need it. The equipment is always super sanitized and they have great protocols in place to make sure that people are being safe and sanitary because of COVID-19. There is a wide array of equipment and many squat racks for people to use which is nice since not many gyms have this luxury. I would definitely recommend this gym to anyone!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the feedback, Diya! So happy to hear that you are enjoying your experience so far and excited to see you reach your goals with us. Happy Lifting!

reviews.review_text: I love training at Golds University Market Place! The facilities are always clean and the staff here are always welcoming. Training with Ariana as my PT has played a pivotal role in achieving my own personal fitness goals. Ariana tailors my program to my needs and is constantly challenging me, training with her has certainly developed my confidence in working out at the gym. Ariana is awesome, highly recommend!

Absolutely love it here !! I actually wake up looking forward to the gym . I havent been to a gym in 5 years so was a bit nervous starting up but all the staff are so nice and professional. Sam is amazing and made me feel really comfortable! Today I got a free personal training hour with Sasha, which was really helpful. Definitely recommend this gym
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback, Lorna! So happy to hear that you feel comfortable here, we will be sure to let Sam and Sasha know. We re excited to watch you start achieving your goals with us

reviews.review_text: Golds is my favourite gym, especially their personal trainers   Ariana is the best personal trainer I have ever had, honestly! She is so professional, skilled, friendly, and never made me feel silly for being weak or new. Because of her, my confidence is boosted, I look and feel so much healthier, and I enjoy gymming.

Solid environment and culture here, went in for a trial session yesterday and I can t remember his name, but the manager I dealt with was very chill, hospitable and respectful all around. The utility here did not meet my needs unfortunately with my training focused more on bodybuilding, I feel that these gyms could use some more functional equipment (cable crossovers predominantly) but I would definitely recommend this gym to any powerlifters or beginners 100%.

I ve been working out here for a few months now. I can honestly say that I really enjoy working out at this gym, the majority of the staff are very kind and helpful, whenever I ask questions or have concerns they are quick to help. Their cardio machines are really new and easy to use. They have a good variety of equipment and I always leave there feeling healthy and refreshed. It is a super friendly environment and I find it easy to go to with little intimidation which I find a lot in other gyms. There are also less crowds than all of the gyms on campus, which is awesome!

Ive been a member since 2017 and I can definitely say that Golds UBC is one of the most welcoming environments to train in! The gym itself has such a great community and a huge part of this is due to their staff. Alex S. is there almost every time I go in and is always so friendly and welcoming. He always is able to answer any fitness related questions with constructive advice and is so motivating! His positive attitude and encouragements make my morning workouts so much better and its great to see a friendly face. Overall, the staff here are absolutely phenomenal, the equipment is great and I am so happy that I have found such a positive gym environment that is also involved with the community at large! Definitely worth checking out!!

I absolutely love this gym and the staff. Being my first time ever at the gym, these guys made me feel welcome and supported. My trainer Sasha is just exceptional and I am very grateful for her! The gym is also clean and spacious. I 10/10 recommend this gym!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much, Elsie! We will be sure to let Sasha know what you said, we are happy to have you part of our community! Happy lifting.

reviews.review_text: Golds gym university market place is a wonderful gym with an amazing gym environment plus great staff! Ariana has been nothing but amazing throughout my fitness journey and without her I don t think I would be where I am at today! Her support and knowledge has helped me tremendously. The tips I have learned from Ariana has made a huge difference in my training and I can definitely see a big growth in my progress! if you plan on joining this gym and are looking for a personal trainer I would 100% recommend Ariana! :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Happy to be your #1 gym in UBC Andrea!

reviews.review_text: Went to this location as I was in the area and was amazed with the atmosphere I walked into. Being new to the gym I needed some assistance with a few things and a PT named Ariana was above and beyond with helping me with the whereabouts in the gym and even gave me some tips to boost my workout. She was amazing and was impressed that she was willing to help on her own time to ensure I had the best experience.

Golds gym has definitely been a positive turning point in my fitness journey. I started training with personal trainer Sasha Duncan at the beginning of the year, and I can honestly say that I continue to use her advice and teaching in every workout since. Sasha is very dedicated to her work as a trainer and her ability to effectively share her knowledge with beginners like me is extremely valuable! I was able to learn the foundational steps needed to achieve my fitness goals, and saw my form improve greatly. If you are looking for a knowledgeable and supportive trainer, I would definitely recommend Sasha Duncan!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad to hear Veronica! Happy youre enjoying UBCs top gym - Golds Gym University Marketplace!

reviews.review_text: I recently joined this gym! I have worked out at many gyms but I really felt at home when I started working out here! The staff is so friendly and they have all the equipment you need to get a great workout in. Perfect open spaces and their covid policies are superb. Thank you Golds Gym! Super good value!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback! We are happy to hear you re enjoying your experience with us, we re excited to watch you achieve your goals with us

reviews.review_text: All of the staff and especially the managers Sam and Kyle are super great and ive had nothing but amazing service! seeing them every workout is the highlight of my day!! Ariana Zandi is one of the best trainers out there and I really enjoyed training with her! She really connects with her clients, pays attention to your strengths and challenges you. Love her will definitely train with her again :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Olivia! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment our team here. We are so happy to have you as part of the community. Well be sure to let everyone know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: This is a very warm and welcoming gym. Most of the clients are university students or people living in the neighborhood. Both the staffs and clients are so friendly, making the entire environment comfortable. Talking about PT, I have been trained under Ariana s instructions for the past two months, and I absolutely love how professional and inspiring she is! I wasn t new to gym and I was trained under two different PTs before. Comparing my past and recent experiences, I think Ariana is the type of PT that truly spends time planning out systematic schedules to fulfill clients  needs rather than throwing random stuffs from days to days. Since day 1 of the training, she has already awaken my muscles and strength for compound exercises which were scheduled weeks later. She is able to provide easy-to-follow instructions and detail suggestions for further improvement. She definitely pushes me to challenge myself more. I couldn t be able to imagine how much I have accomplished within such a short period of time. I used to go to gym just for the sake of  health  and I struggled mentally every single time. However, I really enjoyed my times working out in the gym this two months, and even looking forwards to attending specific  interesting  sessions haha. Overall, if you are looking for a PT who is both professional and fun to talk with, I would highly recommend Ariana to you!

Sasha Duncan is an amazing personal trainer; hands down one of the best Ive worked with and Ive worked with many coaches and trainers over the years. She thoughtfully tailors my workouts to my abilities and goals, continually pushes me, and easily switches gears on the fly if need be. She shares her fitness knowledge in ways that are easily understood and put into action, and her enthusiasm for weight training is contagious. I definitely look forward to our training sessions, especially during these difficult pandemic times.

Nice gym with a large range of equipments. I train with Matthew H (PT) and have had very good experience with him. Super accommodating and professional. I like that he keeps track of my progress through Google Drive so I can have access anytime. He s also very responsive about any fitness question I have outside of our training sessions. The gym also adheres to strict COVID guidelines per the provincial instruction, which I appreciate very much.

I have been going to this gym for almost a year now and the staff are not only professional, kind and knowledgeable but never fail to greet me in an upbeat and positive way. The environment at the gym itself is always clean and sanitized properly by staff (which is extremely important right now during the pandemic). This is a great gym! Special shoutout to Sam and the rest of the front desk team who make going to Golds UBC a great experience.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and community here. Well be sure to let Sam and the entire team know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Been going to this gym for years and it s worth your money! Covid safe and friendly staff. Wide variety of equipment and also has an Olympic Platform with kilogram plates for Olympic weightlifters. Although there are 35 people limit for each session, people usually cancel last minute so I havent been stressing out about booking an appointment with them! Awesome gym :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the feedback, Niki! We are grateful to have you as a valued member over the years. Excited to have you continue reaching your goals with us, happy lifting!

reviews.review_text: Gym is good, I ve been working out here for more than 2 years. Just hope you can stop playing Hardstyle EDM in the future please!!! It s really disturbing. Appreciate!

I know Gold s Gym always provides quality machines for a great workout  but the one thing that definitely stands out is their customer service. I believe her name is Cassandra but she s always such a pleasure to deal with. I really hope they continue to hire quality people like her. It makes a difference !
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Kasia! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and community so far! We will be sure to let Cassandra and the entire team know what you said. Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Amazing gym, makes me look forward to working out!! Began working out here as soon as the gym reopened in July and my experience has been nothing less than exceptional. The measures taken to ensure safety and cleanliness in the location are admirable. Thankful for the atmosphere and friendliness from everyone, both staff and other members, they make working out at Golds UMP an absolute pleasure :)

Going to the gym has always been important to me, but with COVID I was quite sceptical as to which gyms would be taking protocols seriously and effectively allowing people to workout while following the guidelines. The management and staff are incredibly welcoming, and they are following protocols very tightly, and have been able to create a safe environment for people to workout during this pandemic. I recommend Golds gym to all of my friends and family, and many have signed up and love going. I 100% recommend anyone looking for a gym to give Golds Gym a try!!

Starting a fitness journey can seem like a difficult task, but personal trainer Sasha Duncan has always shown it to be simple and fun! Her workouts are made specifically to target areas you need to improve and are truly effective. I ve seen huge imrpovements in my overall mobility, strength and confidence at the gym! She listens very well and is able to adapt any workout instantly to best suit her clients. Amazing experience!

The absolute best part of this gym is the group power class. The instructors are so awesome and inspiring and make you excited to come back!!! Since playing competitive sports in high school, I hadnt found a way to exercise that was sustainable in terms of how much I enjoyed it, affordability, time, impact on body, etc. but group power has been so amazing for me, and I have to give credit to Jen and other instructors for making it such a positive experience for everyone. I would recommend to anyone!!!

I joined the gym while i was working in the area last summer. great equipment and everything was really well maintained. What really put it over the top for me though was the fact that their trainer Kyle took the time to answer any questions I had before signing up, and even checked in with me regularly afterwards to make sure i dint have any issues with anything. Great guy and great service 10/10

Ariana has made my first personal training experience absolutely incredible. She helped to identify numerous muscle imbalances and both supported, and pushed me in the gym. Her training program allowed me to improve my form, and gain strength and confidence. Ariana is an incredible addition to the gold s team and I am so grateful to have had knowledge and expertise to support my fitness journey.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Caroline! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and personal training here. Well be sure to let Ariana know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Probably one of the best gyms I ve been to in Vancouver, and I ve tried many (Steve Nash, Club 16, community centres, etc.). The gym is well-maintained as the washrooms and machines are always clean. I also feel safe working out at Golds UBC because the max capacity is 30 people, and the machines are spread out enough for me to have my own space. Additionally, the staff is very welcoming and approachable, unlike other gyms. I highly recommend this gym !
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the feedback, Bern! We are happy to hear you have been enjoying your experience with us so far, we will be sure to let the entire team know what you said. Glad to have you part of our community here, happy lifting!

reviews.review_text: My experience at Gold s Gym at ubc has been nothing but amazing! Working with personal trainer Ariana has been the best decision I ve made. Ariana is extremely knowledgeable in terms of not only training but also nutrition, and she really tailors your sessions according to your fitness goals. One hour flies by when you re training with her because she s super personable but also so efficient with the time! I ve already learned so much from the four sessions we ve had so far and I ve never felt so motivated to become healthier and stronger. I would highly recommend Gold s gym, especially personal training with Ariana!

This is seriously the best gym ever!!! The staff here are extremely accommodating and friendly. Not only do they all welcome you when you arrive, but by name! The facility is always very clean and all of the machines are new and work very well. I love my membership here!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback and review, Rochelle! Happy to have you part of our community. Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Golds Gym UMP is awesome! The staff are super friendly and they always make you feel welcome. They have all the equipment you need and have COVID precautions in place to make sure you feel safe when working out. I would highly recommend this gym to anyone!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback, Ryan! Happy to hear that you feel at home with us. We will be sure to let the whole team know what you said. Happy lifting!

reviews.review_text: Training with Michelle (PT) is one of the best thing happened to me this summer! Ive been training with Michelle regularly for 2 months now, and it felt really good. I become more energetic everyday. She is so sweet and easygoing, and most of all, she is very caring of my experience. I would recommend her to anyone who is new to gyms or who is professional. Also, on the days I don t train with her, she would always instruct me via message. She would give honest opinions, motivates you, and gives recommendations on healthy diets. When the first time I went to Michelle, all I wanted what to lose weight. Right now, I want to build muscle and strength and look fit and healthy. She really changed my idea of a  perfect body . Overall, working out is fun and my body is becoming more fit and proportionate. I am more than happy. golds gym        3                       gym               nice                                                Michelle      nice                                                                                                                                               gym gym              gym           Michelle

Went to this gym throughout my time at UBC and still going to this day. This gym has everything you need: free weights area, guided machines, cardio stations and a studio. The staff is always welcoming and friendly, the PTs are knowledgeable and Kyle the manager is always making sure the operation is running smoothly. They have also doubled down on cleaning and sanitization amid COVID and the additional precautions they have taken to prevent the spread of the virus definitely make me feel safe working out there. Best gym in the area by far!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback, Thibault! Great to hear that you enjoyed your time with us during school and beyond. We will be sure to let the entire team know what you said and excited to see you continue reaching your goals here. Happy lifting!

reviews.review_text: I worked with a personal trainer here, Bryan for a few weeks. I felt that the gym offered a good selection of equipment, plenty of space, and seems to have many kind people working there. Id definitely recommend the personal training sessions if you can afford to try them out, they help alot with learning technique for preventing injuries & do a great job of showing you new ways to train.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Michael, happy to help and be your UBC gym!

reviews.review_text: I strongly recommend this place! The gym could be busy sometimes, but the people there are super nice. Ariana is an amazing personal trainer, I would give her 10 out of 5 if I could!!

Love this gym, got all the equipment you could ever need. Staff members like Emmanuel make Golds UMP an extremely safe and fun place to workout during Covid-19. Super supportive and also made the sign up process quick and easy. Happy to be back
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad youre happy Rohan! We pride ourselves at being UBCs top gym!  Were here to help with any questions on your best UBC gym membership.

reviews.review_text: Started coming here since the start of 2021 and have been pretty satisfied with what the gym has to offer in terms of the equipment. Recently started working with my personal trainer Bryan Wong who has been greatly helping me out a lot in terms of how to structure my workouts, pace them and with proper technique. And with a solid resume to back it up. Kind of wish I started doing PT when I was a lot younger now.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Happy to hear Kevin - were proud to be a top UBC gym!

reviews.review_text: I joined the gym with 7 other friends over year ago and we have been working out at this location ever since. The gym is very clean and spacious compared to other choices on campus. The service has changed from mediocre to very satisfying ever since they brought new management to this place a couple of month ago. The prices became transparent and competitive, the issues I addressed were resolved in a timely manner as well. Overall I should say this is a very good and professional gym and will recommend my friends to come as well.  -  2014/12/10 Eric Jia

What has definitely impacted my experience at Golds is having Ariana there as a personal trainer. She is the one person who pushes me to my greatest ability when I think that Im not strong enough, she pushes me and motivates me. Ariana is undoubtedly one of the greatest assets to Golds and I genuinely would not be so determined on improving myself if it wasnt for her! Best PT!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Lara! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment our team here. We are so happy to have you part of the community. Well be sure to let Ariana know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: If you want to get a head start on your fitness goals and get a better physique, come to Golds Gym UMP and talk to the manager Milos Ristic. He will explain everything to you with respect and patient, he will help you to set up your goals and give you tips on how to achieve them. If you also consider to have a personal trainer, Ian Standish I suggest. He is one of their best trainers, I started working out with him since March 2019, and we made a lot of progress in the last 3 months. He is experienced and well organized. He keeps tracking on my strength and cares about how I feel through out the workout. He makes small changes to our workout every session  and encourages me to push harder. I have had a great experience here with these people,  and Im very excited to have my next body composition test on June 1st, and see how much progress I have made.

Great gym located conveniently at UBC which is great for an early morning workout before classes or after evening classes. The best part of this gym is the amazing group fitness classes and instructors. You can tell that they really care about delivering fantastic workouts and put a lot of energy into each and every class. The instructors promote an inclusive workout environment by showing modifications so that everyone feels successful in their classes. I highly recommend trying group power, as it is your one stop shop in regards to a workout class.

This Golds Gym location is a little smaller than other locations, catering to students and locals in the UBC area. UPDATED** Current letting 40 members in the gym at a time and no more booking system. Tap in with your fob and workout when you want! Live tracker is available on the website for each location. YOU CAN STAY up to 1 hours and 45 min during non peak times, 1 hours and 15 min during peak times. UMPs peak times run Monday-Thursday 12-730 pm and Friday Saturday after 12 until about 7. Sundays are mostly dead. Front desk staff track your workout time when you check in and will give you a heads up if they have a line waiting and you need to exit... You can always tap out, jump back in line and workout again tho. Cleaning is on point, compared to other facilities the team uses a cleaning log to ensure every 15 MINUTES different areas of the gym are sanitized. Its still mandatory to wear your mask inside, so come prepped with an active wear mask rather than a heavy cotton one. (you can buy viral off Golds Gym branded masks at the front desk) They also now sell a variety of Golds Gear, visit the website for more info and pics :)

Ariana is hands down the most supportive and dedicated personal trainer I ve ever met. She s supported me through my fitness journey from the very beginning and continues to push me and believe in me. Without her, I wouldn t have the confidence nor the motivation I have now in the gym. Training at Gold s would not be part of my daily routine if it wasn t for Ariana. If you ever need a PT, Ariana s your girl.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Meilee! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment our team here. We are so happy to have you part of the community. Well be sure to let Ariana know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: I have really enjoyed my time so far at this gym! They have a decent selection of equipment and machines and the staff are very friendly and helpful! Also, the facility is kept very clean and sanitized, which is extra important now with all of the COVID-19 guidelines in place.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback, Landon! Happy to hear that you have been enjoying your experience with us so far and feel safe while training. Happy lifting!

reviews.review_text: Being a member since 2017, I began to work out with my personal trainer, Michelle Marin recently. I ve done personal training before, but she is the most wonderful trainer I ve ever met. She fully understands my fitness goal and she plans the process successfully. I m very satisfied with working out with her, and totally recommend her to anyone.

I switched to gold s in January because I was tired of poor service from the other nearby gyms and I could not be happier! The staff is very friendly, professional, and helpful. Finding spots is easy and sanitisation levels are top notch. 10/10 would recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback, Anant! We will be sure to let the entire team know what you said, we are happy to have you part of our community and looking forward to seeing you achieve your goals here. Happy lifting!

reviews.review_text: I signed up recently and wasnt quite familiar with the booking system. The staff here, especially Cassandra, has been more than accommodating and patient in guiding me through the whole process. She made the whole process super easy for me. Safety precautions are also great, and Ive never had any issues with cleanliness or social distancing.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the feedback and review, Barry! Happy to hear that you are enjoying your experience so far. We will be sure to let Cassandra and the team know what you said. Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Bryan Wong was my personal trainer and he was super helpful! He is easy to get along with and very knowledgeable. I had no experience with powerlifting but Bryan quickly taught me how to safely do the specific lifts I wanted to learn, as well as many general tips about lifting and bodybuilding. Training with Bryan was definitely a great experience!

One of the Best Gyms Ive worked out. The staff was really catering to my needs and was polite and understanding, when I asked for help on how to use machines, the PT staff, (I think his name was Jorge) was helping me use equipment I was not familiar with. Would definitely come back for a workout next time Im in town.

What an amazing place. The fitness instructors are so professional and positive. Huge thanks to Jen, Ella, Suzie and Janice for being such a hard working team. I love these classes. I also enjoed personal trainers i had here. Thank you  Candice and Raven.

Wide variety of equipment and layout is easy to navigate. Staff are always friendly and welcoming; familiar faces such as Alex Savanovic have made it their goal to establish great customer service as well as friendships with every member who walks in. Ultimately a solid gym experience.

Bryan was my personal trainer and he was awesome. Really easy to get along with and quickly figured out what I needed to do to accomplish my goals. It was clear that he knew what he was talking about and was able to help me in a lot of ways. He kept our sessions fun but also maintained a level of professionalism as well. Highly recommend Bryan if youre looking for personal trainer at Golds.

Gold s Gym has really changed my lifestyle and my self-image. Simply going to the gym four times a week has made me a healthier and happier person. Two years ago, I was breathless climbing up a flight of stairs, but now I feel much stronger and my stamina has increased beyond belief. My wife and son also go to Gold s, so the Gym has become a family affair. The management and staff are wonderful, and always welcoming. I strongly recommend this Gym!

Heres the deal... Ive lifted at UBC for the past two years without even so much as blinking an eye in the direction of Golds Gym. Today I stopped by for a personal training session with Bryan Wong (more on that later!), and was blown away by the gym. Super clean, tons of machines and weights, friendly staff... Overall, a super professional and fun environment! If youre looking for a gym with a little more space, a few more options, and a super motivating atmosphere - Golds is the place for you! The location is also super fantastic: super accessible (with amazing open hours) and conveniently located. I did an assessment with Bryan followed by a two-hour training session, and let me tell you... I am beyond DEAD! Bryan pushed me super hard, motivated me a ton, and gave me a plethora of unique pointers to utilize in my future lifts. I am super excited to incorporate what I learned with him into my routine and ultimately get stronger! Definitely work with him if you get the opportunity - you wont regret it and your muscles will be thanking you later (even if it hurts in the interim). Overall, I had such a positive experience at Golds Gym at UBC and would recommend it to anyone! Even if youre a bit skeptical, check it out! A drop-in session never hurt anyone - unless, you know, you like, actually injure yourself... (But with the super great staff present, thats not gonna happen! And also, know your limits and be safe.)

Ive been working with PT Sasha for a week now and have already seen a huge improvement in my strength and confidence in going to the gym. She modifies exercises if needed but also pushes you to work hard. I highly recommend her if you are looking for a trainer!

Golds ump is a great and welcoming place to workout and their personal trainer Ariana has helped me so much with my fitness journey. She listened to what my fitness goals were and together we crafted a workout plan that was realistic and really well thought out.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Brandon! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment our team here. We are so happy to have you part of the community. Well be sure to let Ariana know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Well, I agree to some of the reviews here. The gym has changed over the last couple of months. At least where I gym, the management is different and the reception is nice as well. The membership plans are far simpler than what it used to be. If you do not want to become a member then you do not have to. However, the gym has been a pleasant experience for me. Some of the equipment is really fab!!!

Ive been going to this gym a little over a year now, and people who work here are always nice, kind and helpful! Especially Kyle is a manager who is very professional yet easy to communicate with. There are equipment for powerlifting, bodybuilding and weightlifting. 4 racks, 3 deadlift platforms and 2 benches, 2 incline benches so there are plenty of spots to train compound movements such as deadlift, bench press and squat. During the covid times, the employees here are doing the best job maintaining the gym clean and safe place and they are following the protocol rigidly. Trainers here are super knowledgeable and professional as well!

Great gym! Offers wide range of machines and weights and has proper covid sanitation protocols in place. Staff are all really friendly and time slots are easy to book, would definitely recommend coming here!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Shannon! Happy to hear that you are enjoying your experience so far. Well be sure to let the entire team know what you said, happy lifting!

reviews.review_text: Very inclusive environment that enables all athletes from all walks of life to pursue their fitness goals. Staff are highly qualified and friendly!!! Would definitely recommend to all UBC students and Staff as well as of those who live in the area. Alex Savanovic  one of the staff members at Golds was also of great assistance and was a consistent friendly face that made the gym more welcoming.

Golds Gym has been a great place to work out during this pandemic, they take all the necessary precautions. The employees have been very helpful, especially personal trainer Matthew Herbert has been great.

Must try personal training with Sasha Duncan Sasha helped me to quickly tone up, learn to deadlift properly and feel confident enough to lift free weights alone. Without her help, I d probably be hiding in the corner doing leg lifts or something. Honestly, the pandemic has really bummed me out, but training with Sasha instantly became a high point in my week. If you want a talented personal trainer that is fun enough to laugh at your jokes (but also won t let you talk your way out of your workout), I can t recommend Sasha enough.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Jackie! Happy to be your top UBC gym!

reviews.review_text: Ive often struggled with committing to a workout space due to my complicated relationship with the concept of exercise.  I related my concerns when discussing whether or not to sign up for a membership at this gym, and my fears were promptly alleviated.  Cassandra calmly talked it through with me, inspired me to take the leap, and we came to a mutually beneficial conclusion. I am now quite excited to improve my fitness and improve my overall temperament towards exercise!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Cal! Happy to hear that you feel welcomed and are enjoying the atmosphere here so far. We will be sure to let Cassandra know what you said. Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: The classes are AWESOME!!! So much fun!!! Great workouts, great people, time flies by!!! Classes are for everyone from first day in the gym to super advanced as instructors give options for different levels! Get sweaty, make friends, feel good! Group Power is my favourite!!!

Fantastic gym, super friendly staff, and an incredible sponsor for our annual dance battle event on campus that raises money for a local mental health initiative. They really went above and beyond with their sponsorship package, too. Were very impressed by their level of community involvement on campus, and we really hope to work with them again in the future!

I love golds. They have all the machines and cardio equipment I need. Furthermore, the staff is extremely polite. During the pandemic, they are taking all necessary precautions in order to keep everyone safe. The manager at the UMP location is also super nice.

Ive been lifting here for nearly a year now. The facility is always clean and well maintained. The staff have always been outstanding and friendly. I would confidently say this is one of the best gyms in the Lower Mainland.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback, Niko! We are happy to hear you ve enjoyed your experience with us over the year, we re excited to watch you continue achieving your goals with us

reviews.review_text: Ariana Zandi is one of the most dedicated and exceptional PT s I ve come across. Her expertise has helped me perfect my form, challenge myself, and become more confident in the gym. She has made my Gold s gym experience the best it can be. If you re looking for a fun and knowledgeable PT, Ariana is your girl!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Maya! We are so happy to have you part of the community. Well be sure to let Ariana know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Gold s Gym has been a key supporter of our service fraternity, Alpha Phi Omega. They worked with us to create an excellent sponsorship package. We re so appreciative of the time they ve taken to work with us, and their dedication to being a positive influence on the community.
Very good experience overall! Ariana is an absolutely amazing trainer. She is so sweet, understanding and helpful.

I ve been going to this gym for years and more recently, signed up for personal training under Nathan Godden. With his help, I ve been able to overcome a plateau in my fitness journey and improve my overall performance. I could not have asked for a better trainer.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow! Glad to help and be your top UBC gym located in University Marketplace Joey.  Were happy Nathans helping you towards your best gym experience.

reviews.review_text: I ve been training with Bryan Wong for almost 1.5 months now and it has been quite an experience. For the longest time, I was hesitant to work on compound exercises. Bryan has really helped me work on my bench, squats and deadlifts. To me, Bryan is not just my trainer or coach, he s also my good friend and a big brother. It s good to have someone you look up to and Bryan is that person for me. Often between sets, or outside of gym, he gives me a lot of his wisdom and tips on fat loss, muscle building, nutrition or life in general. He always keeps me accountable on my goals and has instilled in me a lot of discipline. Highly recommend Bryan if you re looking for a personal trainer.

I have been doing personal training with Sasha from Golds Gym UBC for a few months now and I would highly recommend her. Sasha is a fantasic  personal trainer who is knowledgable and willing to take the time to explain in detail the mechanics of each exercise. I have seen significant improvements in my abilities and have really enjoyed my time working with her!

Covid safe, accessible and friendly staff, wide range of weights and machines. Easily the best gym on ubc campus. The sessions are an hour and 15 minutes, which gives ample time to get a nice workout in. Also a wide range of times lots available from 6:30am to 9:30pm. 10/10 recommend !
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your feedback, Enzo! Happy to hear that youre enjoying your experience with us so far, glad to have you as a valued member

reviews.review_text: The classes are AWESOME!! I felt so welcomed the first time I attended a class - I was immediately helped by the instructor (Jen) as soon as I walked through the door. I recommend Group Power (weightlifting) and Ride (spin) classes for anyone interested in starting out :) I ve been going to Gold s for a year and a half now, and have been doing Mossa classes for four years without any previous experience!

If you desire to have a personal trainer who is intelligent, approachable, resourceful, encouraging and motivating you to extend your comfort zone and achieve what you thought was impossible, meet Ian Standish at Gold s Gym at UBC. Whether you would like to tone your body or grow muscles, Ian will patiently listen to your objectives and come up with a plan that includes both diet and exercise that will get you there! My goal was to become stronger, tone my muscles and have a proportionate body that I would be proudly showing off anywhere and I achieved that! Within a few months, I can dead lift 140 pounds and I have a wonderful feeling of firmness. I am a confident person but my self-confidence grew exponentially since I have been exercising with Ian. I look forward to every workout because he is both a determined personal trainer and a wonderful person!

I used to go to the gym sporadically because of my own laziness until I started meeting the amazing staff at Golds Gym. In particular, the friendly face of Alex Savanovic always encouraged to keep pushing through the pain and show up consistently until I was happy with my body. I now get excited to go to Golds several times a week and Alex has never failed to give me the energy and passion I need to get through my workout!

Since it has been under new management since November, I have noticed a huge improvement in overall maintenance, management, and facility care. The machines are fresh and new, staff is very friendly and helpful, and I plan on renewing my membership once it has expired. Very impressed, would recommend this gym to any of my close friends.

Great equipment, great atmosphere, very clean and well kept. Safe during COVID-19 since sanitation is everywhere with disinfectant spray bottles. System is flexible with cancelling and changing sessions- very accommodating. Definetely the best gym out there at UBC.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback! We are happy to hear you re enjoying your experience with us, we re excited to watch you achieve your goals with us

reviews.review_text: Golds Gym is the first gym i went to that I felt comfortable in. The staff is great, always there if you need anything and the environment is really welcoming. Cant reccomend it enough. Special thanks to Cass.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Omar! Happy to hear that you are enjoying your experience so far. We will be sure to let Cass know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: When it comes to personal training, you go in with the objective of improving your physical health. At least that was my plan, but in training with Nathan Godden it s been so much more. Not only does he cater a program specifically for your needs (a heavy emphasis on mobility in my case for working on set) but he s always available for clear communication whenever I have questions. He s helped in my progress through all facets of health and is a true professional I would never hesitate to recommend others go see.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were really happy to hear Austin! Were proud to have top personal trainers and one of the best gyms in UBC located in University Marketplace.

reviews.review_text: Super conveniently located next to UBC. The group fitness classes are awesome! I love the friendly and motivating atmosphere, and the great community of people Ive met in classes. Group Ride and Group Power together have gotten me stronger and leaner, and I always leave class with a huge, sweaty smile on my face :)

As a single father to two young kids, it is very difficult to find the time to workout with my hectic schedule. When my friend told me about Golds I was sceptical, as I had always heard anecdotally that Golds was a gym full of muscleheads. When I finally caved and went for a workout on my day off, my expectations were completely subverted. The facility was cleanly and there were people of all levels of fitness working out. The staff were happy to engage in conversations with me and helped me figure out a plan to insert fitness back into my life. A special thanks to Matthew and the other staff for helping this father of two find time for himself again :)

In the midst of the covid pandemic, Golds gym has been able to provide me with an adequate place to workout, while still prioritizing the health of its customers! They ve been able to adapt to the new regulations and have made it easy to book sessions online. 100% recommend .

Ive had an amazing experience at Golds Gym so far. The staff, especially Alex Savanovic, are extremely friendly and create such a safe and motivating environment to work out in. Im so glad I got a membership here!!!

Great gym with super friendly and helpful staff. They were a great sponsor for our Science RXN event and went out of their way to provide an excellent sponsorship package. We hope to work with them again in the future!

Golds Gym UBC is my favourite gym in Vancouver. They have a comprehensive facility and their staff are great people. Kyle Uy, the manager,  is an up and coming prominent figure in the Vancouver fitness world. Kyle takes care of his members and staff which leads to an awesome training environment. Bryan Wong is also an amazing personal trainer that can have you making improvements within weeks of starting! Thank you GOLDS UBC!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback! We are happy to hear you re enjoying your experience with us, well be sure to let both Kyle and Bryan know what you said! We re excited to watch you achieve your goals with us

reviews.review_text: Great gym over all. Golds Gym UMP is very clean and COVID safe. The gym has a variety of equipment to offer the members. Not to mention, the staff are wonderful!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for the feedback, Samantha! Happy to hear youre enjoying your experience with us so far, well be sure to let the entire team know. Happy lifting!

reviews.review_text: Fantastic facility and staff. Amie and the rest of the gang do a great job in providing a friendly atmosphere in which it is easy to reach your goals and succeed. All in all, one of the best gyms Ive ever been to.
